name: @padresmurfa/assume
description: Make your assumptions explicit in code, so they don't end up being the Mother of All F*ck-ups

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/babel
scripts.build: npm run-script babel && npm run-script minify
scripts.rebuild: npm run-script clean && npm run-script build

author: David Brandt <padresmurfa@gmail.com>
